Votes.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Title: Authorizes the presence of dogs in state parks
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to issue rules, regulations and programs necessary to allow the presence and behavior of dogs conducive to the characteristics of each state park; requires the installation of dog waste stations; requires dogs to be under the direct supervision and control at all times by the owner or custodian of such dogs; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to allowing the presence of dogs in state parks
